action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The warrior adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the warrior must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
